scripts.dev: concurrently "cd triddle-backend && npm run dev" "cd triddle-frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd triddle-backend && npm run build && cd ../triddle-frontend && npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd triddle-backend && npm install && cd ../triddle-frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd triddle-backend && npm run clean && cd ../triddle-frontend && rm -rf build
scripts.test: cd triddle-backend && npm test && cd ../triddle-frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd triddle-backend && npm run lint && cd ../triddle-frontend && npm run lint
